踿踿踿

踿字的基本解释

踿
cù
古同“蹙”。
退：“推选了谁，谁也借故向后踿。”

踿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zú］
［《龍龕手鑒》子六切］
(1)迫近。参见“踿蹌”。
(2)蹬。
(3)退。

踿字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　踿； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1230第14
【篇海】子六切，音足。迫急。又近也。○按音義與䠓同。从酋之字或有从秋者，如鰌之爲鰍是也。

踿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
踿字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Jump
cù
Gu Tong "flopped".
Retreat: "Whoever is elected, anyone will jump back with excuses."
Jump
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zú］
[Six cuts of "Longkan Handbook"]
(1) Approaching. See "staggering".
(2) Stepping.
(3) Retreat.
Jump
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Foot Character Department】　踿; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1230-14
【Pianhai】Six cuts, full sound. Urgent. It's near too. ○According to the pronunciation and meaning, it is the same as the same. The word Congchi may have those who have Congqiu, such as 鰌zhi for the loach.
